title: Timeline View State Schema
description: Client-side state for chronological timeline view configuration, persisted in localStorage

viewMode.description: Selected view mode: category (vertical lanes) or timeline (chronological swimlanes)

zoomLevel.description: Time range zoom level determining date axis granularity

visualScale.description: Visual scaling factor for event cards and spacing (0.5x to 2.0x)

scrollPosition.description: Horizontal scroll offset in pixels from timeline start

timestamp.description: Last update timestamp in milliseconds since Unix epoch (for cache invalidation)
